label: New In Box (NIB)
notes: New item in original manufacturer packaging. Unopened and unused. Includes all original components, manuals, and hardware. We warranty all items for 30 days.

label: New - Open Box (NOBOX)
notes: New item, factory seal broken or packaging removed. All original components included. Never used. We warranty all items for 30 days.

label: New - Missing Hardware (NMISS)
notes: New item, may be missing original packaging, manuals, or minor hardware. Fully functional and unused. We warranty all items for 30 days.

label: Excellent - Barely Used (LN-EX)
notes: Previously owned, appears barely used with minimal signs of wear. Tested and fully functional. We warranty all items for 30 days.

label: Used - Very Good (VG)
notes: Previously used, shows light cosmetic wear from normal use. Tested and fully functional. We warranty all items for 30 days.

label: Used - Good (GOOD)
notes: Previously used, shows signs of wear or discoloration due to normal use. Tested and fully functional. We warranty all items for 30 days.

label: Used - Fair (FAIR)
notes: Previously used, shows moderate to heavy wear. May have cosmetic damage. Tested and fully functional. We warranty all items for 30 days.

label: For Parts or Not Working (FPNW)
notes: Item sold as-is for parts or repair. Not tested or may not be fully functional. No warranty provided.
